alert.note: Alert for Dalton Highway Summits; Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 26 at 1:51AM AKST until December 26 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 inches for a storm total of 8 inches. * WHERE...Upper Koyukuk Valley and Dalton Highway Summits. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan for difficult travel conditions. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. Deep snow will make travel difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow is expected to taper off Tuesday morning. Nearly 6 inches of snow has already fallen at Bettles as of midnight Monday night.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Dalton Highway Summits; Upper Koyukuk Valley
